```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```
```{r}
x<- 
read_excel("class_enrollment_summary_by_term2.18.20.xlsx", skip = 3) %>% clean_names() %>% mutate(course_id = parse_number(course_id))

departments <- x %>% select(course_department, course_name, total) %>% group_by(course_department) %>% summarize(num_enroll = sum(total)) %>% arrange(desc(num_enroll)) %>% head(5)
departments
```
